show.subtitle: Charlene Spretnak and her guests track the progress of the “Big Make-over,” the cultural and political Relational Shift that is occurring in all fields as a result of recent discoveries that life is far more dynamically interrelated than modern societies have realized.
show.title: All Together Now

header.title: The Local Food Movement in Central Italy

title: The Local Food Movement in Central Italy
content: A talk with Elizabeth Wholey, author of Sustenance: Food Traditions in Italy’s Heartland; the Slow Food Movement’s role... <!--more--> in invigorating the local food culture in the Upper Tiber Valley; poem by Shelley
